content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":192172,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは少しだけ緊張していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"You were a little nervous."},{"lineNumber":192173,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あそこ、ガラスの工芸品があるんだって、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, over there, they say there's some glass crafts,"},{"lineNumber":192174,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょ、ちょっと覗いてみよう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's, let's have a little look?\""},{"lineNumber":192175,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":192176,"originalJapaneseLine":"スシヌの言葉にあなたは頷いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"You nodded at Sushinu's words."},{"lineNumber":192177,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、えとえと……えっと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, um, um... um...\""},{"lineNumber":192178,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then..."},{"lineNumber":192179,"originalJapaneseLine":"　行こっか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's go...\""},

{"lineNumber":192180,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":192181,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは頷いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"You nodded."},

{"lineNumber":192182,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あははは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ahahaha...\""},

{"lineNumber":192183,"originalJapaneseLine":"（…………）","translatedEnglishLine":"(...)"},
{"lineNumber":192184,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ふふふ、甘酸っぱい）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Hehe, bittersweet)"},

{"lineNumber":192185,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたはスシヌと一日、デートをして過ごした。","translatedEnglishLine":"You spent the day on a date with Sushinu."},
{"lineNumber":192186,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとなく、以前よりも親しくなれた気がした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow, you felt you had grown closer than before."},

{"lineNumber":192187,"originalJapaneseLine":"「毛利が跡継ぎ！　毛利元就！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mouri is the heir! Mouri Motonari!"},

{"lineNumber":192188,"originalJapaneseLine":"　血飛沫に嗤わせてもらう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll make you laugh in a spray of blood!\""},

{"lineNumber":192189,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ！　お前ら！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on! You guys!"},

{"lineNumber":192190,"originalJapaneseLine":"　命が惜しけりゃ有り金全て出しな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you value your lives, hand over all your money!\""},

{"lineNumber":192191,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなた達は立ち寄った村で山賊達に襲われていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"You were attacked by bandits in a village you stopped by."},

{"lineNumber":192192,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},
{"lineNumber":192193,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、山賊に襲われるのはいいんだがよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, being attacked by bandits is one thing, but..."},

{"lineNumber":192194,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんでテメェがそっち側にいるんだよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Why the hell are you on their side!\""},

{"lineNumber":192195,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……お？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},

{"lineNumber":192196,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわっはははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guwa hahaha!"},

{"lineNumber":192197,"originalJapaneseLine":"　分からん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don’t understand!\""},

{"lineNumber":192198,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いつものように暴れとったら！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was just rampaging like usual!"},

{"lineNumber":192199,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気づいたら慕われとったわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Before I knew it, I was admired!\""},

{"lineNumber":192200,"originalJapaneseLine":"「テメェら！　アニキを馬鹿にすんじゃねーぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You guys! Don’t make fun of my big brother!\""},

{"lineNumber":192201,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そーだ、そーだー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s right, that’s right!\""},

{"lineNumber":192202,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これも世の奇縁！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is also fate’s strange bond!"},

{"lineNumber":192203,"originalJapaneseLine":"　観念してオレらに命取られろぃ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Give up and let us take your life!\""},

{"lineNumber":192204,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、アニキ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, big brother..."},

{"lineNumber":192205,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺らの目的は金っす……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Our goal is the money...\""},

{"lineNumber":192206,"originalJapaneseLine":"「知るか！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don’t care!!!!!\""},

{"lineNumber":192207,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひゅー、痺れるっす！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whew, that’s thrilling!"},

{"lineNumber":192208,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アニキについてくっす！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We follow big brother!\""},

{"lineNumber":192209,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……おい、アレ一応テメェの部下だろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hey, that guy’s your subordinate, right?"},

{"lineNumber":192210,"originalJapaneseLine":"　＜エール＞、止めろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"‘Yell,’ stop him.\""},{"lineNumber":192211,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":192212,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたはザンスに言われ、","translatedEnglishLine":"You were told by Zans,"},{"lineNumber":192213,"originalJapaneseLine":"一応元就を止めてみた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and you tried to stop Motonari for now."},{"lineNumber":192214,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":192215,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいだろう！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fine!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":192216,"originalJapaneseLine":"元就は快諾してくれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Motonari agreed happily."},{"lineNumber":192217,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大将の言うことだからな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because it’s the general’s orders!\""},{"lineNumber":192218,"originalJapaneseLine":"「顔を立ててやる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll save face for you!\""},

{"lineNumber":192219,"originalJapaneseLine":"「テメェら！　こっちを向け！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You guys! Turn this way!\""},

{"lineNumber":192220,"originalJapaneseLine":"「元就山賊団！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Motonari Bandit Gang!"},

{"lineNumber":192221,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本日を以て……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Starting today...\""},

{"lineNumber":192222,"originalJapaneseLine":"「解散だ！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is disbanded!!!!\""},

{"lineNumber":192223,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなぁ〜！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nooo~!\""},

{"lineNumber":192224,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アニキぃ〜！　見捨てねえでくれ〜！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Big brother~! Don’t abandon us~!\""},

{"lineNumber":192225,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何慕われてんだ、あいつは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why is he admired, that guy...\""},

{"lineNumber":192226,"originalJapaneseLine":"「てか、一応＜エール＞の言うことなら","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, if it’s 'Yell' telling him,"},

{"lineNumber":192227,"originalJapaneseLine":"　聞いてくれんだな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"he actually listens...\""},

{"lineNumber":192228,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの元就がね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That Motonari, huh..."},

{"lineNumber":192229,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあ、それが分かっただけ収穫かな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, just learning that is a gain, I guess.\""},{"lineNumber":192230,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわっはははははははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guwa ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!\""},

{"lineNumber":192231,"originalJapaneseLine":"今日も元就は元気いっぱいだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Today, too, Motonari was full of energy."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは少しだけ緊張していた。
「あ、あそこ、ガラスの工芸品があるんだって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, over there, they say there's some glass crafts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょ、ちょっと覗いてみよう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's, let's have a little look?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スシヌの言葉にあなたは頷いた。
「え、えとえと……えっと……」
「じゃ……
行こっか……」
あなたは頷いた。
「あ、あははは……」
（ふふふ、甘酸っぱい）
あなたはスシヌと一日、デートをして過ごした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You spent the day on a date with Sushinu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく、以前よりも親しくなれた気がした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, you felt you had grown closer than before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「毛利が跡継ぎ！　毛利元就！
血飛沫に嗤わせてもらう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll make you laugh in a spray of blood!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ！　お前ら！
命が惜しけりゃ有り金全て出しな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you value your lives, hand over all your money!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達は立ち寄った村で山賊達に襲われていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were attacked by bandits in a village you stopped by.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、山賊に襲われるのはいいんだがよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, being attacked by bandits is one thing, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでテメェがそっち側にいるんだよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why the hell are you on their side!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐわっはははは！
分からん！」
「いつものように暴れとったら！
気づいたら慕われとったわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before I knew it, I was admired!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「テメェら！　アニキを馬鹿にすんじゃねーぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You guys! Don’t make fun of my big brother!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そーだ、そーだー！」
「これも世の奇縁！
観念してオレらに命取られろぃ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Give up and let us take your life!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、アニキ……
俺らの目的は金っす……」
「ひゅー、痺れるっす！
アニキについてくっす！」
「……おい、アレ一応テメェの部下だろ。
＜エール＞、止めろ」
あなたはザンスに言われ、
一応元就を止めてみた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and you tried to stop Motonari for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいだろう！！！！」
元就は快諾してくれた。
「大将の言うことだからな！」
「顔を立ててやる！」
「テメェら！　こっちを向け！」
「元就山賊団！
本日を以て……」
「そんなぁ〜！」
「アニキぃ〜！　見捨てねえでくれ〜！」
「何慕われてんだ、あいつは……」
「てか、一応＜エール＞の言うことなら
聞いてくれんだな……」
「あの元就がね……
まあ、それが分かっただけ収穫かな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, just learning that is a gain, I guess."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐわっはははははははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guwa ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日も元就は元気いっぱいだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today, too, Motonari was full of energy.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは少しだけ緊張していた。
「あ、あそこ、ガラスの工芸品があるんだって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, over there, they say there's some glass crafts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょ、ちょっと覗いてみよう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's, let's have a little look?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スシヌの言葉にあなたは頷いた。
「え、えとえと……えっと……」
「じゃ……
行こっか……」
あなたは頷いた。
「あ、あははは……」
（ふふふ、甘酸っぱい）
あなたはスシヌと一日、デートをして過ごした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You spent the day on a date with Sushinu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく、以前よりも親しくなれた気がした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, you felt you had grown closer than before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「毛利が跡継ぎ！　毛利元就！
血飛沫に嗤わせてもらう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll make you laugh in a spray of blood!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ！　お前ら！
命が惜しけりゃ有り金全て出しな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you value your lives, hand over all your money!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達は立ち寄った村で山賊達に襲われていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were attacked by bandits in a village you stopped by.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、山賊に襲われるのはいいんだがよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, being attacked by bandits is one thing, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでテメェがそっち側にいるんだよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why the hell are you on their side!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐわっはははは！
分からん！」
「いつものように暴れとったら！
気づいたら慕われとったわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before I knew it, I was admired!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「テメェら！　アニキを馬鹿にすんじゃねーぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You guys! Don’t make fun of my big brother!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そーだ、そーだー！」
「これも世の奇縁！
観念してオレらに命取られろぃ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Give up and let us take your life!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、アニキ……
俺らの目的は金っす……」
「ひゅー、痺れるっす！
アニキについてくっす！」
「……おい、アレ一応テメェの部下だろ。
＜エール＞、止めろ」
あなたはザンスに言われ、
一応元就を止めてみた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and you tried to stop Motonari for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいだろう！！！！」
元就は快諾してくれた。
「大将の言うことだからな！」
「顔を立ててやる！」
「テメェら！　こっちを向け！」
「元就山賊団！
本日を以て……」
「そんなぁ〜！」
「アニキぃ〜！　見捨てねえでくれ〜！」
「何慕われてんだ、あいつは……」
「てか、一応＜エール＞の言うことなら
聞いてくれんだな……」
「あの元就がね……
まあ、それが分かっただけ収穫かな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, just learning that is a gain, I guess."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐわっはははははははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guwa ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日も元就は元気いっぱいだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today, too, Motonari was full of energy.
